pages.text: The Atomic Disassembler is Mekanism's an all-in-one tool, essentially the ultimate, electronic version of the Paxel (working at any mining level). Also functions as a Hoe & Scoop (Forestry)$(p)The Atomic Disassembler has multiple modes that can be cycled with $(k:sneak) + right click.

Base speed setting, single block, roughly equivalent to Efficiency II.$(p)Farmland tilling and Grass Path functions have been moved to the MekaTool $(l:items/modules/mekanism:module_farming_unit)Farming Unit$(/l)
pages.title: Normal Mode

pages.text: Slower than Normal Mode, less power usage
pages.title: Slow Mode

pages.text: Super mode, roughly equivalent to Efficiency V. Uses more energy to function.
pages.title: Fast Mode

pages.text: Like normal mode but will mine a vein of Ore or Log blocks (tagged with forge:ores or forge:logs) matching the start block.
pages.title: Vein Mode

pages.text: Like Vein Mode, but works with any block.
pages.title: Extended Vein Mining

pages.text: Functions as if out of power - no mining speed benefits or extended functionality.
pages.title: Off
